headline: Minneapolis Public Housing Authority and Comcast Announce Technology Partnership
summary: Partnership will connect housing units to Xfinity's reliable WiFi network MINNEAPOLIS, MN / ACCESS Newswire / May 20, 2025 / The Minneapolis Public Housing Authority (MPHA) and Comcast announced they have partnered to provide a WiFi connection ...

headline: Comcast Advertising Introduces New AI Platform to Help Small and Local Businesses Create Cost Effective Commercials in Minutes
summary: NEW YORK, May 20, 2025--Today, Comcast Advertising, the advertising division of Comcast, announced a brand-new AI creative platform that gives brands an easy way to build TV-grade ads to reach audiences across the premium TV ecosystem. This platform is powered by a partnership with Waymark, a pioneer in using artificial intelligence to scale up video production. With this platform, advertisers can quickly build creative without the time or cost usually associated with TV commercial production.
